mukti.heading: Mukti
mukti.content: Welcome to Mukti'13, the annual national level technical symposium on Free and Open Source Software of the GNU/Linux Users' Group NIT Durgapur to be held from 2nd-5th February 2013

about.heading: About
about.content: It's hard for Tux to type without fingers. So please come back after some time, while we ask him to hurry up ;)

events.heading: Events
events.content: Whether you are technically inclined or don't mind learning some cool stuff while having fun, we've got an array of events lined up to make sure you have a gala time at the fest, and hopefully end up with some cool prizes up for grabs !!!

technical-events.heading: Technical
technical-events.content: From cracking the logic to engaging coding problems to server configuration to hacking software, these tech events will give you a flavour of what it's like to be a software developer.

non-technical-events.heading: Fun
non-technical-events.content:
You don't need to be a great programmer to have fun. These events prove why !!!

And who knows, you might walk away as the champion, all at the cost of having fun. Now that doesn't seem like a bad deal after all, does it !

bts.heading: Behind The Scene
bts.content:
What do you need to write a piece of code ?

Inputs...Outputs...We give you both and also the freedom to think and express.


What do we need ? Just the use of your parietal lobe to crack the LOGIC that unravels the path leading from the INPUTS to the OUTPUTS.


So get ready to rattle up your analytical skills and become the 'scene' stealer.

konfigure.heading: Konfigure
konfigure.content:
Do you love showing-off your troubleshooting skills to your friends?

Do you take pride when you see people come running requesting you to fix their system crashes ?

It’s time you pit your skills against a real challenge and take them to the next level.


It’s time to fix a server now. It’s time to Konfigure.


Contact:

Arjun       9749954761

Garima    8820211761

incanity.heading: InCanity
incanity.content:
Correct logic? Check!   Proper Code? Check!   Ambiguity ???


Welcome to the world of C language.

The only way to survive is to 'C' through the code before it drives you insane !


Rules:

1. The contest will be conducted in 2 rounds, viz. the Prelims and the Final.

2. A maximum of 3 participants per team is allowed.

3. The Prelims will comprise of 30 objective (MCQs and short answer type) questions.

4. The qualifying teams will be allowed to compete in the Finals.

5. For the Final Round, each team will be provided with a GNU/Linux machine.

6. The Final Round will consist of five programming problems which will have to be solved within a stipulated time.


Contact:

Shashwat  9874587005

Anuj            8927052427

lipi.heading: Lipi
lipi.content:
The flagship translation event of MUKTI’13, Lipi is back!


You'll be given strings from the documentation of a free and open source software. All you have to do is translate the given string into Hindi or Bengali. Your translations will then be judged by a reputed FOSS language translator in both the languages and the winners will adjudged accordingly.


Your contribution goes into the development of the software without you even having to write a single line of code. So come, and be a part of this exciting contribution fiesta of the FOSS community !


Contact:

Jeet           9475201787

Siddhant  9681939126

imagimp.content:
Do you love to sit back and doodle in class behind the professor’s back?


Now give wings to your imagination as we bring you a platform where your drawings will not just fetch you appreciation but also prizes.


Get. Set. Sketch !!!

freepl.heading: FreePL
freepl.content:
Go Online... Be a Pro Selector!!


Is Cricket a religion for you ?? Do you consider yourself a cricket guru ?? Do you have it in you to pick that star team before which every other team shall bow ??


If any of the above answers is YES, then this year, MUKTI presents before you, FreePL.

It’s a test of your cricketing prowess. This is the time to prove your mettle as a selector.


So bring out the “super selector” in you and build the best team on the cricketing circuit who you think will bring you victory, irrespective of foreign and domestic barriers.


Every passion has its destiny. Come meet yours !!!


Contact:

Arjun      9749954761

Priyam   9674681233

freemex.heading: Freemex
freemex.content:
Leave the Bull and the Bear behind because the Tux is here to take you to stock market nirvana. Here the Tux replaces the Bull and there are no bears because you never lose in the free market.


The name says it all, free as in free of cost, free as in FOSS and free as in the stock market of FOSS. This online trading stock game lets you be your corporate best and hoard FOSS shares for glory!


Come home to the world of this rare programming genii where you juggle FREELY with shares and lose nothing or all !!!


Contact:

Anuj     8927052427

Ayush  7679604990

footballpl.heading: Football PL
footballpl.content:
Are you a football fanatic ?? Do you eat, sleep and dream football ?? Bob Marley said “FOOTBALL IS FREEDOM”. Do you feel the same??


Well, the wait is finally over. MUKTI’13 presents FootballPL, the ultimate platform to prove your expertise as a football team manager. Prove your mettle and exalt your team to victory.


So, come, pick your squad, fight your way through all odds and emerge as the ultimate winner.
